meta.name: Auto-Reply & Create Linear Tickets from Gmail with GPT-5, gotoHuman & Human Review

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful email assistant analyzing an incoming customer email.
Determine whether you would flag it as important and please classify the email into one of the following categories:
- Product question
- Bug report
- Feature request
- Account & Billing
- Sales opportunity
- Other

{{ $json.reviews?.length ? ("Here are some examples of how to classify correctly:\n\n"+$json.reviews.toJsonString()) : "" }}

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value:
=You are a helpful email assistant. Please draft a reply to the email passed by the user. If you cannot answer questions or draft a complete reply, incl. placeholders. A user will review your draft after this and can fill in more info. Incl. the body of the email only, we are responding within the thread.

{{ $json?.fields?.['emailReply']?.length ? ("Here are some previous email replies for emails of the same category to use as reference:

---
" + $json?.fields?.['emailReply'].join("
---
") + "
---") : "" }}

parameters.content:
## Self-learning Email Classifier
AI classifies the received email into one of the categories defined in the prompt.
To **improve and personalize** the AI agent, we fetch previously approved email-classification pairs from **gotoHuman** and pass it to the agent.

## Self-learning Email Writer
We pass the received email to our AI agent and ask it to draft a response.
It **learns over time** because we pass it the previously approved email replies from **gotoHuman**. We even fetch this training data per classification (s. Classifier AI agent), so that our email writer can reply in a different style to sales opportunities than it does for bug reports.

## Human Review
Let a human review the classification and AI-drafted reply via **gotoHuman**.
Drafts can be **manually edited or retried in gotoHuman** (Retries loop back to the AI email writer node).
All approved values are used for the **self-learning agents**.

## Human asked for Retry
In gotoHuman the reviewer clicked retry or edited the prompt to iterate on the agent output.

## Send approved Reply
Send the approved response as a reply to the email thread

## ✉️ AI Email Assistant: Self-Learning Classifier, Writer & Linear Ticketing

This workflow automatically classifies every new email from your linked mailbox, drafts a personalized reply, and creates Linear tickets for bugs or feature requests. It uses a human-in-the-loop with gotoHuman and continuously improves itself by learning from approved examples.

## How it works
1. The workflow triggers on every new email from your linked mailbox.
2. Self-learning Email Classifier: an AI model categorizes the email into defined categories (e.g., Bug Report, Feature Request, Sales Opportunity, etc.). It fetches previously approved classification examples from gotoHuman to refine decisions.
3. Self-learning Email Writer: the AI drafts a reply to the email. It learns over time by using previously approved replies from gotoHuman, with per-classification context to tailor tone and style (e.g., different style for sales vs. bug reports).
4. Human Review in gotoHuman: review the classification and the drafted reply. Drafts can be edited or retried. Approved values are used to train the self-learning agents.
5. Send approved Reply: the approved response is sent as a reply to the email thread.
6. Create ticket: if the classification is Bug or Feature Request, a ticket is created by another AI agent in Linear.

## How to set up

1. **Most importantly, install the gotoHuman node before importing this template!** (Just add the node to a blank canvas before importing)
2. Set up credentials for gotoHuman, OpenAI, your email provider (e.g. Gmail), and Linear.
3. In gotoHuman, select and create the pre-built review template "Support email agent" or import the ID: `6fzuCJlFYJtlu9mGYcVT`.
4. Select this template in the gotoHuman node.
5. In the "gotoHuman: Fetch approved examples" http nodes you need to add your `formId`. It is the ID of the review template that you just created/imported in gotoHuman.

## Requirements

- gotoHuman (human supervision, memory for self-learning)
- OpenAI (classification, drafting)
- Gmail or your preferred email provider (for email trigger+replies)
- Linear (ticketing)

## How to customize

- Expand or refine the categories used by the classifier. Update the prompt to reflect your own taxonomy.
- Filter fetched training data from gotoHuman by reviewer so the writer adapts to their personalized tone and preferences.
- Add more context to the AI email writer (calendar events, FAQs, product docs) to improve reply quality.

## Create ticket
If classified as bug or feature request we create a ticket

parameters.text:
=Here is an email classified as {{ $('Human review').item.json.responseValues.classification.value }}. We are creating a ticket for the product team. I need you to create a title, description and priority(1: UrUrgent, 2: High, 3: Medium, 4: Low)

<Email>
<Subject>
{{ $('Email to process').item.json.subject }}
</Subject>
<Body>
{{ $('Email to process').item.json.text }}
</Body>
</Email>

value.emailReply: ={{ $json.output?.textEmailDraft ? {ai: {prompt: $('Set Prompt').item.json.prompt}, content: $json.output?.textEmailDraft} : "No reply needed - FYI only" }}
